Articles.Content:
Where are the Kerbals females ???

Except if Kerbals are...

... hermaphrodites !
Maybe there are and they just aren't gender dimorphic.

The development team has stated that Kerbals are genderless.

This thread will now be closed due to 3 reasons: it has an official answer; it has been discussed before many times before and usual ends in sexist tones surfacing.
